website_summaries.verdict: Simple-yet-elegant diner-style creamer, sugar bowl, and spoon, made with solid, high-quality craftsmanship.
pros: An attractive addition to your table, whether to hold sugar, condiments, jam, or ready-to-pour sauces and syrups
Each container holds up to 10 oz., and brushed stainless interiors are BPA-free and won't affect flavor
Dishwasher safe, and 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects
cons: Capacity of the containers is less than some expected

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the searching and get them
customer_reviews.text: This is the best all purpose sugar and creamer set I've found. I've looked at crate & barrel, anthropologie, Macy's, Nordstrom, etc. I decided that ceramic is not ideal and chips all too often. Bone China is too much for everyday. This is absolutely perfect and sturdy. Well made. Not too casual for a fancy dinner and not too formal for everyday. As a bonus they match my mirror finish bodem. Just save yourself the searching and get these.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Classy and traditional
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size. I love the modern yet traditional feel to these. The style and durability make these stand out. I haven’t had to clean them yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Set
customer_reviews.text: Quality stainless steel set that you would be proud to show off to your guests. It arrived on time and in great condition. Heavy duty and I'm sure will last for years. No need to re-purchase another sugar and creamer set in a few years.
customer_reviews.author: SMH

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying using this set very much. The sugar bowl/spoon is the primarily used item. The spoon is perfectly sized for my tastes. I've used the creamer once. No issues with it at all. The only thing that would be better is if the creamer had some kind of lid. I knew it didn't when I bought the set. The weight of this is good. I've even placed the creamer on the stove burner to take the chill off the cream and had no problems/discoloration. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MTGirl69

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality but pricey. Glad I bought it. It looks great and did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M. F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set
customer_reviews.text: As I said in my Frieling tray review, I bought the sugar and creamer set to go with the tea pot and tray. Very nice design and functionality on all pieces. The set will go with any tablecloth or sit on any table without clashing with the room decor. Easy to keep clean and looks very elegant but much sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Loisaida

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, a nice clean look. Happy with my purchasez
customer_reviews.author: Rhondita

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality, timeless design
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and crafted. They're durable and very attractive. The arrived in great condition with a flawless finish. Enhances the overall appearance of the kitchen without drawing attention. However, when using or otherwise focusing on them, the simple elegance shines. Having the dedicated dry sugar spoon always at the ready really comes in handy. They really got this one right and I hope it stays in production for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Wheelbarrow Racers

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but too small
customer_reviews.text: I just received these, and they're really beautiful and of high quality, but just too small, so I'm going to return them :-( If you don't drink coffee or tea a lot, and you just want something attractive for display, or for guests, this would be perfect. But I'm a hard core coffee drinker and don't want to have to fill these up all the time.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGirl

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: This item is extremely small. It looks like part of a child’s tea set.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Masters

customer_reviews.title: My Son likes it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for him. I had gotten him the teapot last birthday, and this for Christmas. He uses them a lot and we both like the modern design, which is one of the things that sold me in the first place. Made in America counts for a lot, too.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice. I love that the spoon fits & can always sit inside the sugar bowl. The creamer doesn't leak & I also purchased the tray. It looks so beautiful when all together, but it is our everyday sugar Bowl no fingerprints it always looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite!
customer_reviews.text: I love this creamer and sugar bowl - they are just beautiful! And I've actually used them in some of my highly realistic oil paintings as I love painting reflections. This set reflects items nearby, wonderfully well, and of course, we love using this creamer and sugar bowl!
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Fritch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This set arrived perfectly packaged and they are absolutely beautiful! There were a lot to choose from but I liked the style of these and I am very pleased with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set for the table. It's kind of industrial looking so you have to like that style. It presents well with the Frieling Tray.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it. It does was it's suppose to do ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. It does was it's suppose to do and on the top of it looks great. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Danica

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very elegant service set. Well worth the price, actually looks in person, looks much more expensive than the price. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ChiBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Frieling Creamer and Sugar Bowl Set
customer_reviews.text: Please see my review of the Frieling Primo Teapot with Infuser, 34 ounce. Thank you very much for reading my review.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Uriburu

customer_reviews.title: Frieling Creamer and Sugar Bowl
customer_reviews.text: These match the Frieling French Press and tea maker. They are flawlessly constructed and are made of heavy enough stainless steel to last. I have them on my table all of the time. I liked them so much that I have given these as gifts. I had the first set for two or three years and the originals look just as good as when I first got them.
customer_reviews.author: rp

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Creamer & Sugar Bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is a very elegant set. Very impressive & looks just perfect with the Frieling Press Pots. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: All four products are beautifully made, look great and work really well. The teapot pours well and the sugar/creamer/ tray are super. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bush

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little sugar, creamer and tray for a coffee bar
customer_reviews.text: We had too much coffee-stuff on the kitchen counters, and nothing going on at the bar. So the drip coffee maker, K-cup machine and espresso machine moved, along with a mic for reheating went to the bar. Great idea. But we had no good looking sugar and creamer that fit with the stainless/black look. The sugar and creamer, plus the matching tray that is sold separately, fit the bill nicely. We have a western look in our home, but I love the sparkle of the Frieling set. The design is simple and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Spidermum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, heavy, sturdy, modern looking creamer and sugarer. Very cute. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: L J B

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT gift for french press lovers
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the french press as an anniversary gift for our daughter, she loved it and raved over the beautiful design. When I saw this set, I knew she would love it too. She does, we hope to visit soon and see it in person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice sugar and milk bowl
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set to go with a stainless steel tea pot. They are nice looking, functional and well made. I definitely recommend them. The spoon for the sugar bowl is particularly nice.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bach

customer_reviews.title: Clean modern look and presentation
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and elegant set - I especially like the specially-shaped sugar spoon. Everything appears to be good quality and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: AKM

customer_reviews.title: Small gift
customer_reviews.text: Items are as pictured. Spoon is well designed to retrieve sugar without bending wrist as one would with a regular spoon. Fingerprints only become an issue with sugar bowl, but with a slight buffing with a napkin they disappear.
customer_reviews.author: A. Melean

customer_reviews.title: Fine Product
customer_reviews.text: Came in suberb condition. Was properly packed. Product is well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: D. P. West

product_meta.title: Frieling USA 18/10 Stainless Steel Creamer and Sugar Bowl Set
feature_bullets: Mirror finish 18/10 Stainless Steel creamer and sugar bowl set with spoon
Sugar bowl works for jams and condiments; creamer can be used for sauces and syrups
Brushed stainless finish inside is neutral to taste and BPA free
Dishwasher safe; 1 year warranty against manufacturing defects

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars50 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
